ComicInfo.Summary: An expanded version of the original Dicks miniseries, featuring antisocial antiheroes Dougie and Ivor. Ivor makes some special preparations for Dougies upcoming wedding. Also, Dougie and Ivor hold forth on their philosophy, their hobbies and the charming people they know.
ComicInfo.Tags: Big Billy Foster,Dougie Patterson,Ivor Thompson,Reverend Lyle,Uncle Shuggie,Valerie
ComicInfo.Title: How the Fuck Did they do That?: Them Dicks Stunts Explained!; Trio the Fucking Whore: She Just Can't Help Taking on Three Guys at Once!; The Wanker's History of Wanking; Great Belfastmen in History; Just Gimme A Beer; Bad Ideas for Superheroes No. 2433: The Aborter
